title: Latin America : minimum monthly wages in 2019 , by country
yAxis: Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars 462.3 is found at Country Uruguay and the minimum is found at Venezuela where Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars is 7.0.
The minimum Country Venezuela has got 66.04 times less Monthly minimum wage in U.S. dollars than the maximum Country Uruguay.
